name: Ninjajar!
overview: After several months leaving mouths and making pachochas to all the "evil overlords", or malotes of the devil, that still remained in Chóchester (province of Badajoz), and after taking off his super-fist of PODEWWWR of the last of them, Ninjajar decided that already It was time for a break, so he went to his village to find his girlfriend to go and spend a few days on the beaches of Pepinoni. But damn! When he arrived at the town, his girlfriend was not there ... a monkey had kidnapped her! This upset the urgent plans of Ninjajar to have an intimate and personal encounter with his girlfriend (what is known everywhere as as "Qatar Totete"), which put our hero in bad baba and decided to jump into the void of the search of his beloved.
